sentences.sentence: Whatever goes to the tilth of me it shall be you!
sentences.translation: 凡在我地上帮助耕种的也将是你！

sentences.sentence: It has very little nutrient value, but can improve your soil tilth.
sentences.translation: 它很少营养价值，而且可以改善你的土壤耕层。

sentences.sentence: Your women are a tilth for you (to cultivate) so go to your tilth as ye will — 2:223.
sentences.translation: 你们的女人是你们耕作的田地，所以你们如你所想地耕种吧。
